local_angles.angle: Super Bowl 60 Transportation Survival Guide: Navigating Santa Clara Like a Pro
local_angles.description: Master the art of getting around Santa Clara during Super Bowl 60 with our comprehensive transportation guide. Discover the best public transportation options, ride-sharing strategies, parking tips, and alternative routes to minimize traffic headaches.
venues: VTA Light Rail (direct access to Levi's Stadium)
Santa Clara free shuttle (game day service)
ACE Train (connects to the wider Bay Area)
